response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. This product holds immense value for us, reflecting years of research and development. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, we believe it's worth more than just monetary value; it promises to enhance your life or business significantly. Given its importance, we're extending this opportunity to you at an exclusive price of $7,500. This offer is tailored to recognize your potential to appreciate and utilize the product to its fullest potential. We're confident it will exceed your expectations and deliver long-term value. Please let us know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.", "product_price": 7500}
